readable.title: 3541483943_9776baee7c
readable.content: A man performing a trick on a skateboard at a graffiti covered skate park . A man wearing a grey shirt is doing a skateboard trick on stairs . a skateboarder has kicked his board up onto its back wheels in an indoor skate center . A skateboarder jumping down the stairs . The boy is jumping a skateboard down the steps , surrounded by graffiti covered walls .
